name: TRIEntryMetadata
description: Metadata for entry in the Toyota Research Institute Dataset

properties.name: provider
properties.description: The institution that generated the data

properties.name: manufacturer
properties.description: The company that manufactured the cells

properties.name: cell_type
properties.description: Geometric form of the cell (e.g. cylindrical, coin)

properties.name: nominal_capacity_ah
properties.description: Nominal capacity of the cell as per manufacturer specifications

properties.name: nominal_voltage_v
properties.description: Nominal voltage of the cell as per manufacturer specifications

properties.name: upper_voltage_cuttoff_v
properties.description: Voltage limit to which the cell is charged to.

properties.name: lower_voltage_cuttoff_v
properties.description: Voltage limit to which the cell is discharged to.

properties.name: drate
properties.description: Discharge rate. Units in C/n notation

properties.name: crate_1
properties.description: Cycling rate during first charging step. Units in C/n notation

properties.name: crate_2
properties.description: Cycling rate during second charging step. Units in C/n notation

properties.name: soc_switch
properties.description: Value of state of charge where charge protocol changes from first to second step.

properties.name: start_datetime
properties.description: Datetime when the cycling starts, in ISO string format.

properties.name: rest_time_s
properties.description: Resting time after first charge step and after discharge

properties.name: last_cycle
properties.description: Total number of time the cell was cycled.

properties.name: formation_cycle_rate
properties.description: Cycling rate during the formation cycle. Units in C/n notation

properties.name: repository_url
properties.description: url to access the repository storing the data of the cell
